trustfund:
TF034920-TUNISIA - MUNICIPAL DEVELOPMENT II,TF034546-TUNISIA - SECOND MUNICIPAL
            DEVELOPMENT PROJECT,TF034212-TUNISIA - MUNICIPAL DEVELOPMENT PROJECT,TF034062-TUNISIA - URBAN DEVELOPMENT

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Second Municipal
            Development Project are to: (i) enhance infrastructure and
            services in Tunisian local governments (LGs); and (ii)
            increase efficiency of public sector management at the local
            level.  The project consists of the following components: 1)
            municipal infrastructure; 2) training, technical assistance,
            and equipment to strengthen the management of the municipal
            development agency Caisse des Prets et de Soutien des
            Collectivites Locales (CPSCL); 3) technical assistance and
            equipment to improve management of LGs, General Directorate
            for public and local governments (DGCPL) and General
            Directorate for Regional Affairs (DGAR); 4) the training
            center program for local governments; and 5) community participation.
